document.full_text: mike pelfrey, the mets' starter, improved to 2-3 and took a run off his earned run average by allowing only one in seven and two-thirds innings.
document.title: mets 5, giants 2: for pelfrey and struggling mets, 'nice and easy' works wonders
lines_and_colors: mike pelfrey, the mets' starter, improved to 2-3 and took a run off his earned run average by allowing only one in seven and two-thirds innings.
